thread.section_title: Mabel's Labels Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mabel's Labels | mabelslabels.com | 3 of 141
thread.title: Serena

author: Serena
title: Serena
text: This is our third year of using the labels, and we love them! The labels on our lunch containers are still going strong despite many trips through the dishwasher. We really love the shoe labels; they stayed on my sons runners for a year and were still stuck when the shoes were ready for the garbage. The clothing tags stay on through repeated washings and prevent lost mittens, coats and sweaters. We will be buying these for years to come!
